website_summaries.verdict: This space-age looking aluminum and steel mount delivers a very strong magnet with minimal contact with your mobile device. Easy to install and universal design for many devices.
pros: Strong magnet holds firm over bumps and potholes
Portrait or landscape display, and this magnet will hold your device in place while keeping a wide range of motion, so passengers can use it as well
Versatile design that you can use as a GPS unit, MP3 player, or at-home charger
cons: Some phone models can slide and droop
Won’t stick to smooth silicone back of certain mobile devices, so a case is required
Some users report the ball itself can detach

customer_reviews.title: Won't work with a Galaxy Note. Not if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Won't work with a Galaxy Note. Not if you use the pen anyway. The pen wont write where the magnet is on the back of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: ASC

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnet and poor adhesive.  Complete fail.
customer_reviews.text: Might be OK in a car but not in a work truck. The magnet isn’t strong enough to hold my iPhone when I hit bumps and the phone would either swivel down so I couldn’t read it or fall to the floor. Then the adhesive wouldn’t hold to my dash in spite of me carefully cleaning it with alcohol then letting the adhesive cure for two days before using it. Total fail for lack of a good adhesive pad and a weak magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Tellitlikeitis

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE their customer service is fantastic.All emails were quickly answered
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best phone mount out there.I have driven through pot holes ,made sharp turns.sudden stops & quick acceleration which had no effect on the phone .Stop looking this is the ultimate phone mount. This is installed in rental car I didn’t want to leave Any marks on the dash so I purchased a inexpensive cd mount on Amazon for 11$ i then installed the STEELIE 360 MAGNETIC MOUNT on the modified cd mount as you can see in the pictures no PROBLEMS.I is easily removable and reinstalled in another car.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grassi

customer_reviews.title: Genius idea, but it slides without modification
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and the small size, but it falls with the weight of my mid-sized iPhone X in a case. Regular road vibration causes it to drift downward. I cleaned the contact area to make sure no oils were lubricating the ball bearing, but that made no difference. I tried to roughen the ball with 100 grit sandpaper at first but ended up using a stone bit on a drill to texture the ball surface enough to stabilize the phone’s weight. I’ve also ordered more 1” ball bearings I’ll epoxy in various places to make this a movable mount system. See my photos for reference.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mount WHEN it is working correctly, certainly better than most. First off I bought two of them last december, the first one has broken due to the plastic ratcheting teeth inside wearing away which means that it will be a matter of time before the next one goes. Nite Ize, can you make them with metal teeth??? If so you could make the ratcheting more precise eliminating the need for the loose rubber cushions that fall off all the time. Or you could just make them more permanent please. I have purchased a replacement phone bracket because I don't want to remove the ball from my dashboard.
customer_reviews.author: MJHeil

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT. *Confirmed through Manufacturer.*
customer_reviews.text: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT. Vent Mount failed after a 5 months of using on weekends only. Manufacturer confirmed this is a Counterfeit item sold on Amazon. * Specifically, once driving vibrations occur, the silver ball loosens causing the phone to rotate which is extremely frustrating. In turn, you must remove the phone and hand tighten the ball over and over again for it to remain secure. Unable to generate a problem with order as it is outside Amazon’s window, but have written the Amazon Seller for an update. Pending, and will update this post if a positive outcome.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Steelies used to be great...
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I had a steelie on every digital device I owned. The magnets were nice and strong and the adhesive lasted. I bought this kit for a work phone in a work truck and I couldn’t be more disappointed. Not only is the magnet so weak it can’t stay attached to anything, the dashboard mount adhesive is garbage. It says it’s 3M but it did not stick. I attached it to a clean, flat, smooth surface and both adhesive circles that came in the box failed to stick. I ended up using super glue. I can tell from previously having steelies, that their quality has gone way down. I recommend people buys Scoche or something else that works.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lucksley

customer_reviews.title: Great mount
customer_reviews.text: This is my second steelie mount. I had the first Gen model and my only complaint was the thickness of the phone mounted portion made it uncomfortable in your pocket. This new version solves that issue with a simple flat metal plate. They should make just the phone mounted portion easily available for those wanting to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great mounting system
customer_reviews.text: Worked great mounting my S7 Edge onto my dash for Navigation while driving. Super convenient and slick to use...you just throw it up there then just grab your phone off the ball afterwards. As a bonus, I can stick my phone to steel objects, like onto my microwave so I can read a recipe from my phone while working over the stove. I was worried the magnetic piece on the back of the phone would be annoying, but I hardly notice it and still carry my phone as before in my front pocket.
customer_reviews.author: parchisi

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious Little Device
customer_reviews.text: As I said, this is an ingenious little device. Very clever. It works perfectly, and as described. My only criticism is that it does not work with wireless charging when you place the disk dead center on your phone. (It may work if the disc is placed lower on the phone. I have not tried) On the upside, I adhered mine to the OtterBox rubber case, so I can remove the rubber case to charge wirelessly in a pinch. The ironic part is that just two weeks ago, I purchased three wireless chargers that are now less convenient due to this very convenient phone mounting kit.
customer_reviews.author: JimFromJersey

customer_reviews.title: Another great Nite Ize product.
customer_reviews.text: I love all things Nite Ize, and this phone mount is no exception. I drive a 2010 Malibu. Mount adheres to the dashboard perfectly. Solid as a rock. I use an Otterbox on my iPhone 8 and the metal plate adhered perfectly. When I move the phone to the steel ball, it literally sucks it from my hand to the mount. Rock solid in every position, won't budge unless I move it with my hand (it doesn't respond to potholes, road bumps, etc.). I use the bicycle mount version on my hybrid bike and it's just as solid. If it doesn't work for you, you're not using it correctly. Another Nite Ize great product.
customer_reviews.author: Letter Size

customer_reviews.title: Still on my dash
customer_reviews.text: The steelie is a neat tool. I wasn’t thrilled at the flat magnetic adhesive for the back of the phone. I did end of having to change my phone case for it to work, so that kind of sucked. However, the steelie has now made 3 cross country trips in my car, and has proven itself worth every dime. I really want the steelie arm & throughly recommend this best, useful product to others who need help mounting their phone to the dash for navigation.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hipple

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, great option
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the one that clamps on to the A/C vent. I don’t think there is a better option out there. The suction cup type will usually fall off the windshield in extreme heat. I’m not in to sticking things to my dash so this was recommended to me by my niece. I love it. I highly recommend it and it is quality built. Don’t waste your time on the cheap options like I did. Buy quality the first time. This is available in different configurations.
customer_reviews.author: TxGuy

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best phone mount avaialble
customer_reviews.text: I have been against purchasing phone mounts for my iphone because most just don't do a good job and are ugly to look at when your phone isn't mounted... this is by far the easiest and most convenient phone mount option available. You can mount your phone without even looking and move your phone to the position you need it if you are checking messages or using GPS. Definitely a smart idea the way it was developed and will be putting these in all my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Starlord

customer_reviews.title: Add a little glue if needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but recommend you add a little glue to help with adhesion. I have 3 of these and if they aren’t upright (not fighting gravity) none of the three with stay adhered to my dash. Otherwise they work like a charm. The magnetic pet that sticks to you phone sticks to all kinds of things (my workbench, the outside of my car, metal shelving). That’s something I didn’t plan on, but love.
customer_reviews.author: CL Steves

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing to use for cell phones and vehicles EVER. Not sure if the magnet is protected from credit card chips, but my phone is never in the pocket of my wallet. I can attach to motorcycle tank @ 80 mph, the phone doesn't move. Love the ability to move my phone in any direction with the ball bearing feature, turning it away from me is the easiest thing in the world. No distractions when driving, cant see the screen, so I can pay attention to the road
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this version because I've had bad luck in the past with adhesives and cold/hot weather
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this version because I've had bad luck in the past with adhesives and cold/hot weather. The vent clip holds on securely and has only swiveled from side to side a little but has never come off. If you do not center and balance the mount to your phone properly, the ball joint will not keep it straight where you want it. Gravity wins each time even though there is a gummy substance in the center to stop that from happening. I've found that you can keep it from moving around if you have the phone plugged in and use the cord as a means to keep the phone from moving.
customer_reviews.author: TacG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick :(
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this because I am sick of my vent magnets. I unfortunately could only get this to stick properly to my dash for a couple days. Now when I attempt to grab my phone off of the ball, the ball comes with. The magnet works great and I like that you can pivot your phone to all angles, but a giant bummer that I am not able to get it to stick to my dash anymore. 2018 Volkswagen Atlas
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Koenen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live Up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my commuter vehicle. I was sadly disappointed at the performance of this product. To begin with it looked fantastic, however after only four months the adhesive has been replaced once. The magnet will no longer hold the phone in place. I use my navigation and I place my phone in landscape to see the map better. In the beginning the phone was held in place well but now it slowly falls out of place and becomes an annoyance to have to reposition. Especially when I’m needing it and in middle of driving. After reading product reviews and other research I didn’t expect this after only a few months of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a phone mount that attached to my air vent. I decided to give the Steely a try since it would free up an air vent and seemed like it would provide some versatility in where it could be placed in my car. Glad I made the switch! It holds my phone well and allows me to turn it however I like for better viewing. I liked mine so much I bought another one for my daughter. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CCK525

customer_reviews.title: Strong grip
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a no fuss holder for my cell phone that wasn't bulky or complicated. The way the grip mechanism is designed, the product grips the vent very well and keeps my phone handy but out of the way. It doesn't shift or slip off. I like how I can turn and tilt the phone when it's attached. Since the magnet is attached to the phone, I can attach my phone to other metal surfaces like the fridge or a file cabinet at work, safe and out of the way, but still handy. So good, I bought one for my son-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: A.F

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, adhesive did not work well on mazda dash
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with this is by far the best phone mount I had ever seen or had and the magnet was amazing. The stupid adhesive pads and such would not fit anywhere or stay on my 16 Mazda 3 for long for the life of me though. If they could figure out that flaw it would be an AMAZING phone mount. The magnet was amazing and the angles and turning options at a whim were spectacular if you drive a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality.
customer_reviews.text: REI sells this product for $50, better deal here! Detachable ball makes for easy separation should you need to quickly hand your phone over to a person. Easy to use, mounts securely with amazing suction. The angles it can achieve should work for everyone too! Simply squeeze and forget clamping system is easy to use to attach your phone in place. I liked it so much I bought 2, one for myself another for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Caskey

customer_reviews.title: Not Strong Enough
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the description, this magnet is not strong enough to keep a phone steady in a vehicle. I have an iPhone 6s without a cover, and the magnet cannot support the phone while plugged into a charger in landscape orientation. The phone shifts downward toward the charger (which is very loose and not tugging on the phone). I tried to give it a chance, but it is not worth the high price. When I tried to return, Amazon states it is not eligible for return (less than 30 days later). Do not spend your money on a non-returnable product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best method
customer_reviews.text: Best method I've found for cellphones. Easy to put on or take off phone. However, one needs an almost 1" square solid area to mount the ball, and that larger area that the phone will be in. I'm sure many individuals will have problems because they will not have prepped the surface to stick to the adhesive. In that case, use Shoo-Goo glue, which sticks firmly to anything, yet peels off if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: Liked at first until.......
customer_reviews.text: This product and all the related items that work with the magnet are great but......do not place your hotel keys, credit cards, or any other important magnetic strip near the magnet. It goes without saying but this has screwed up more cards than ever would have expected. I have had to have debit and credit cards replaced and that’s a huge hassle. If it hadn’t of messed up so many I would have given it 5 stars for sure but only because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Cross U

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just followed the installation instructions and even in the Florida heat everything is still holding strong. Magnet is strong enough to hold the phone in place even on bumpy roads. Can easily rotate the phone from portrait to landscape and it stays where you put it. I mounted the metal plate to the back of my Otterbox Defender case and it is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The first one: the Bal fell out of the mounting cup. I glued it back in but the adhesive mounting tape won't hold. Removed the original tape and used 3M gray mounting tape. It too wants to release. And yes I properly prepared the mounting surfaces. The problem is the weight of the phone and the magnetic ball is too much if you mount it vertically. Horizontal mounting would work better if it's an option. I emailed the Niteize company and explained what happened and they sent me a new one but I fell certain the results will be the same. Great customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bridgman

customer_reviews.title: Did they change something or did I get a lemon?
customer_reviews.text: Ok, before I wright this I want to say I bought one from a loves truck stop and I loved it works great. Then I wanted another and my experience goes as follows. I followed instructions to a "T" and it seems like the magnet on the newer one is like 20% as strong as the first. Like it has no hold. And the adhesive is by far worse. Again I must of got a lemon but I tried to stick it to my truck and it's like using Elmer's glue. Seriously if I let go It would just drop NO HOLD AT ALLL. I don't know if they are using cheaper materials or I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Great for most, good for the rest
customer_reviews.text: The holding power of the magnet/ball combo is great. I have not experienced any slippage of my phone. My package came with two extra stick pads in the event you place your ball in a poor spot or change phone cases. The one thing that I have against this item is that the magnet interferes with my s-pen functionality in the screen of my note 10+. I hope that there is some sort of thin metal plate I can put in my case to block that interference. For now, I will only be able to write on the top 3rd of me screen or remove my phone from the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnet Stripped My Credit Card
customer_reviews.text: As a phone holder, it works really well. I was not aware that it would strip my credit card until it was too late. Perhaps they should've made the ball magnetic rather than the phone plate. I would still recommend it, but use with care.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Still Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I like being able to adjust my phone to portrait or landscape. I can easily move my phone, and it holds. I have an iPhone 7 Plus, I purchased the Plus and it is great! I don’t have any big ugly gear on my dash and in my way. Update!! I have had this installed for awhile, still is awesome! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: pictureU

customer_reviews.title: Need better adhesive all 3 I bought r on the floor!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work ever day ! I really like the idea of the product! But in hot cars all day long! The adhesive falls off! Then it is worthless! The magnet is awesome! But disappointed ! I bought 3 and all three r on the floor now! Sorry guys not happy! God bless
customer_reviews.author: Michael bailey

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to everything and stays there.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Galaxy Note 10+ which is a large phone, so it doesn't fit in any of my pockets while I'm at work. I got this system so that if I'm doing anything around my patrol car, I can throw my phone on the car, and it will stay in place. It works exactly as planned. It works so well that I've found ridiculous places to put my phone when using it. One of those places is the air vent on the bathroom ceiling, so I can listen to music while showering.
customer_reviews.author: Bria Snyder

customer_reviews.title: It no longer locks and clamps the cell phone in place.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed everything about this Steelie product.......EXCEPT.........the clamping device that's suppose to hold my iPhone 7 in place stopped working. Meaning............it no long locked in place in order to get a good grip of my phone. It simply stopped "locking". With all the positive reviews regarding this Vent mounted product............I was disappointed. I'm am not sure how I go about returning it to Amazon for a replacement. I certainly wanted to last more than 3-1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Dash piece not secure..
customer_reviews.text: The piece that sticks to the phone is great. The piece that sticks to the dash? Not so much... Kept falling off the dash. I restuck it countless times and even used the extra command trips it came with to no avail. The magnets both stick to each other strong like you'd expect a magnet to do. The piece that goes on the back of the phone was strongly secured and worked just fine. Maybe I got a dud dash piece, but i don't know.
customer_reviews.author: wgs123

customer_reviews.title: My phone doesn't move
customer_reviews.text: So far it has stuck to my dash and to the back of my phone without any issue. Once you put your phone on the ball it will not move unless you go to reposition it — which is easy to do. I never even notice the piece that sticks to the back of my phone. I'm happy with this purchase and pretty much everything else I have ever purchased from Nite Ize.
customer_reviews.author: ajartos

customer_reviews.title: Great phone cradle
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to install and it is fantastic. The way it sticks to the windshield is amazing. Very sturdy. Excellent design. The nice thing is you don't have to have a magnet on the back of your phone. I had one with another style phone cradle and it messed up my Note 9. I could not make notes in the area where the magnet was stuck to the back of my phone. This does not require a magnet on the phone. Great improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Downie

customer_reviews.title: Tape doesn’t last in hot summer.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this mount when I first bought it. So much so that I bought 3 (one for me my husband and my daughter). But unfortunately in the summer heat the tape holding the ball mount to the dash came off in both my cars. I’ve contacted the company and they said I probably bought knock offs (but they are not). They said they would send me replacement tape anyway which probably costs them next to nothing but they never sent it. Should have just bought a cheep mount. Then at least when it came unstuck I could just buy another one. But this one is too expensive to not work. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Great for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Love this mount for my iPhone. Just follow the directions for mounting the magnet & the dash mount. I ordered this in January in upstate NY & had to wait until the temperature was above 70 to put on the car mount. But my iPhone is often put on other magnetic surfaces like the fridge, my bedroom railings, the porch railings & the Steelie tablet pedestal. For me, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Samsung Note
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, heavy duty holder that suctions to the windscreen with zero issues, even on bumpy roads. It easily hold my large Galaxy Note in an Otterbox cover. The only reason for not giving it 5 stars is that I had to replace it after a year as the ball magnet wouldn't hold itself up any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly conveninent
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely worth it. I have a car dashboard that makes it awkward to mound typical phone holders. It was so easy to adhere the ball mount into a tiny spot, I could have put it anywhere I wanted, and it holds the phone perfectly. This has reduced my frustration while driving immensely. It's also convenient to be able to stick my phone to any ferrous surface. Now I stick it on my refrigerator to listen to podcasts while I cook/clean.
customer_reviews.author: John Barry VanZwieten III

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because I have a few friends who swear by this. But from personal experience it didn't work. Within 24 hours of installation---on a part of the dash that was completely smooth and free of texture--it did not stay stuck. And yes, we did clean the surface prior to applying the sticky adhesive. Mid-drive the mount (and phone) fell. It was startling and hardly safe, at all!! Mind you my husband's phone is an iphone 6 or something small and thin. even his case is hardly any extra weight..so that wasn't the cause of the issue either.
customer_reviews.author: simplesays

customer_reviews.title: Terrible idea
customer_reviews.text: I get it. Some people may want a break from having a magnet attached to their phone. But come on. The magnet attaches to everything but the phone. Ive already almost lost the magnet (the most important part) several times because when I go to pick up my phone the magnet sticks to metal more than the piece that is attached to your phone. Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Mighty little Steelie!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little mount kit. Hold my 7 S PLUS phone on the dash with a charging case on it. Love this! Worth the Money. Wish it came with extra mounting stickers for switching up phone cases though. Other adhesive doesn't work as well. Came right off with dental floss as described for replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great work Nite Ize! The Steelie is great. My truck has a blank panel for an add-on accessory that is the perfect size for the mounting ball. My phone is large and heavy and tips forward at times, but that is a nit compared to how neat and tidy and sturdy this product is. Highly recommended! I did follow the instructions for making sure that the surface was clean and left the mounting ball attached and unused overnight once it was installed. Great stickum! The cradle works great and I love the quick release.
customer_reviews.author: Mike - Colorado

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Every one of our family members has this on their phone and it is in every car. We love it so much we buy it for people for gifts. The magnet on the phone has only come off when I have to get a new phone or case (it has never fallen off). The attachment on the car is the perfect height. Warning-if you can not manually turn your vent off, you phone could over heat or get too cold. That is the only drawback I have every noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great after learning how to handle it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after my husband bought one of the original dash mount kits. It's super simple to install, and I like that there's no thick magnet on my phone, just a flat disc. I've been using it for 1 1/2 weeks. So far, the phone and entire mounting system has only fallen from the vent once. After using it a few days, I figured out that if I hold the mount in place while I put the phone on/take it off the magnet, the mount will stay securely on the vent. If it falls off the vent more often, I will return it for the dash mount.
customer_reviews.author: Karrianne M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service from Nite Ize
customer_reviews.text: Great Customer Service from Nite Ize, but design not so great product design. The phone weight pulls the vent down, not allowing it to sit where it is best-suited. The manufacturer did compensate me, when I called them to complain, though. Their suction cup mount does work well, but just doesn't fit where I originally had intended.
customer_reviews.author: Just saying....

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a trucker!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a truck driver and has gone through Soo many different mount kits because the truck rattles so much nothing is strong enough but this has been the answer to his problems this holds the phone without it falling and can handle to truck rumbling down the road! Highly recommend for truckers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing. Perfect for the car.
customer_reviews.text: Had on my phone for over a year now, with zero issues. Was skeptical about this product for fear of magnets + electronics, however I love it, and it doesn't effect my iPhone6 in any way shape or form. Don't notice it I'm my pockets ever, although I wear slightly baggy pants. Only negative to this product is that if you use this to magnetize to other surfaces like the hood above my stove, I noticed metal on metal scratches where I attached the phone on a regular basis. Can't take anything off the review for that, because that's mostly my fault. Overall great product and is now a necessity for me. Would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Zalen

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The ball mount has issues sticking to even, flat, smooth, and cleaned mounting surfaces. I use this in my truck and the radio control counsel is smooth plastic where I decided to mount it. It sticks alright but will come off most times if I lift my phone off of it straight up. It's fine if I lift my phone off to the side it usually stays put. Might end up having to buy more mounting pads as it gets worse. The magnet for the phone holds on just fine and I haven't had any issues with magnet interfering with my phone at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Great car phone mount
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this product a shot to replace an older vent clip holder I had. Happy with ease of installation, and strength of adhesive. My truck dash has a lot of contours so that was an initial concern. The magnet is strong enough to keep my phone in place with no wiggle when driving. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch of magnets?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine around Christmas and I love it. My husband finally bit the bullet and ordered one from himself after months of my convincing. Boy, do I feel like an idiot. His phone barely stays on the magnetic ball! Looking at the recent comments, it seems like a lot of them are relating to the same thing. Maybe the seller got a bad batch of magnets? I have no way to return and no way to contact. I read one recent review where a buyer did try to contact the seller with no luck. I'd use A LOT of caution when ordering...especially for the price. No more referrals from me!
customer_reviews.author: star15022

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly good and unobtrusive. Nite Ize makes great stuff, but this is the best phone holder I have ever seen and used. The magnetic sticker attaches with super strong 3M adhesive that's a peel and stick type that bonds instantly with great strength. I've had no issues with the magnet and its not affected my iPhone in any way, even though the magnet is quite powerful. The magnet is strong enough by itself to support the phone against a metal surface. But the pivot ball is genius because it allows the phone to rotate in any direction. I doubt anyone will be able to come up with a better phone support system that's as portable as this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & Holding stronger than any other, but Opened Box ?
customer_reviews.text: The couple of products i purchased from this manufacturer's were really good and hold it stronger than any other dash mount kits I've ever used. And looks nicer. And of course this one is far better than other one I tried. Only reason I gave 3 stars is the package was arrived torn opened. Not the outer package, the product's package shown in the picture I attached. It looks like it is new inside, but they should inspect it before they ship out.
customer_reviews.author: bahmtoll

customer_reviews.title: Great cell phone mount
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for you cell phone as long as you’re mounting surface is smooth. Also, depending on the weight of your phone, the phone may swivel while mounted on the ball during movement. It’s not a hindrance on how effective the mount will be. Fast shipping and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Eh.. not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for my Infiniti q50's vertical vents. But works ok for the horizontal vent in my Camry. Be advised, the phone does lose its position as you drive and go over small bumps, uneven surfaces or pot holes. I'm keeping it but not really pleased with it. I have it installed on a Samsung S7 ed ( w/ OtterBox cover), if that matters.
customer_reviews.author: IMG

customer_reviews.title: mounting system
customer_reviews.text: the mounting does not work at all.. the 3M on it is awful. The phone part is great and I am using this with my nite ize stand at the office and at home. Wish there was a better mounting system for my car. Overall I have enjoyed products from Nite Ize
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S9 a little too big...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Galaxy S9 with a Defender case, and it seems to be a bit too heavy for the mount. The phone hangs a bit low despite mounting the adhesive exactly to spec. The phone "sways" around while driving as the magnet doesn't hold it tight, but instead allows for full range of motion. In other words, be it's you wanted to use the mount in landscape instead of portrait, it would probably just flip to portrait as soon as you took your first turn. However, I'm a huge fan of the mounting mechanism; very easy and very effective. I just wished the design had been revised for our modern, super-heavy phones
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this in his truck. He loves it! It has held up very well and has very strong magnetic power. So strong he has had it on the side of his truck and rode all the way home with it like that. It has also withstood riding side by sides in the woods and didn't come off the roll bar. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. I cleaned my dash with alcohol and mineral spirits to get rid of any treatment on it. Everything else I’ve tried sticks no problem. But this doesn’t. At all. Not even a little bit. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good little Magnet Mount
customer_reviews.text: I like the material and the adhesive on the Steelie. BUT.... a word of caution from experience..... You have to put the magnet as close to the very center of the phone as you can to get it hang right. Too low and the top flips over upside down, too high and it hangs with the top facing too far down. IN THE MIDDLE, it hangs perfect. So, lesson learned.... PUT THE MAGNET IN THE MIDDLE OF T HE PHONE and you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: WinU

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I had one before this one and the first one was better. Got the old one in 2016 or so. This one the phone magnet is great, but the steel ball for the vehicle had horrible adhesion. Luckily, I have an 07 pickup and I just super glued it on the dash. Works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Turner

customer_reviews.title: Swivels too easily
customer_reviews.text: I like the metal ball and the way it looks on my dash. I don't like the way my phone swivels down and won't stay in one position. I mounted the magnet in the center of my phone. Maybe if I mounted it at the top, it would have worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Not a good solution for a vent mount for your phone.
customer_reviews.text: Phone... Galaxy S9 with thin protective case The phone fit the holder just fine, but every time you hit a good bump/ pothole, expect the magnetic ball/ socket to let go and go fishing in the floorboard for your phone. The part attached to the vent stayed put. The clamp part stayed firmly attached to the phone. The magnetic part is the weak point.
customer_reviews.author: L. R.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone mounts ever!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to have your cell phone nearby while driving this is the product to buy. I have tried many other types of clips mounts and stands on my car dashboard nothing beats the Steele! I actually have two in my work vehicle cause I have a company phone and personal phone as well as in my own vehicle. nothing better, full swivel, solid locked on mounting, easy to grab and easy to put back . Been using this for years!
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Strongest magnetic phone mount I’ve used and it is nicely adjustable. Turns your phone into a magnet so it can stick to anything metal, which is nice at the gym working out. Works better on some vents depending on how your vent is angled. Only down side is it does stick out kinda far. Again more depends on your vents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive stinks
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion sucks. It wouldn’t work for me at all even following the instructions. So I was highly disappointed with that. Ended up having to super glue it to my car dash because the adhesive refused to work. But the magnet is strong and suctions nicely. I think if they made a better adhesive I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Allysa B.

customer_reviews.title: Nite Ize Original Steelie Orbiter Windshield Mount Kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one...liked it so much we purchased 2 more for wife and daughter's vehicles. Magnetic mounts are strong. Positions available are almost infinite. Very well made. We live in farm country...many gravel roads...have yet to have any phone shaken from its mount.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mark E. Kalarovich

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. love being able to attach my phone to any metal surface to leave hanging while I’m working in the shop or having a beer by the truck. I did have to take a sliver of sea foam and super glue it to the ball in my truck so my phone wouldn’t just fold down to where I couldn’t see the screen. Would like to see a modification on the ball to prevent that from happening
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: This needs to go back to the gym, not very strong
customer_reviews.text: Read the directions. Where did the 24 hours decided to wait another 24 hours. Went to attach the holder to the ball itself and it came detached. 3M that comes with it is horrible. Anything stronger would just pull up my Dash so I decided against it.
customer_reviews.author: Patt S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!! The magnet on the phone is powerful! I love it...especially at the gym! The car mount is awesome! I love being able to hop in my vehicle and just plop my phone on it. Absolutely no worries about it falling off or moving while driving!
customer_reviews.author: Wahya

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Great gift idea too.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT! It's incredibly handy to have so that I can quickly mount my phone onto my dashboard without any effort. It also takes up less space than the big phone holders and can be put anywhere! It looks pretty cool too and is a convo starter. Bonus: since the magnet goes onto your phone/phone case, you can stick your phone anywhere that is metal! On the fridge, above the oven, on the side of your car... Endless possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dash Mount is great
customer_reviews.text: I love the Steelie phone holder. The holder for the phone did not stick to the phone very well and had to be redone several times but still worth it. I also purchased the stand for my desk so I can easily use my phone while at work.
customer_reviews.author: SuperShopper75

customer_reviews.title: VENT MOUNT 100% LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This makes my 4+ hour daily commute so much easier. The vent mount was the best choice for me because living in Southern California I knew the heat would cause the suction cup to not function during the summer months. It’s super easy set up and switching the device from car to car is hassle free. I haven’t had any problems since I bought it’s few months ago. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: alda martinez

customer_reviews.title: Weak adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these because I love the one my friend has. But the adhesive on the ball didn’t last long enough to even stick to my car. I tried the wet and dry instructions on the instruction manual, and it didn’t work. So I’ve ordered new adhesive to hopefully fix the problem. I gave this a 3/5 because I know the potential it has, even though it hasn’t worked for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Mount
customer_reviews.text: I tried several suction and adhesive mounts but none could hold my phone securely. This mount is short and strong so it does it move around my dash and it holds my phone at any angle vertically or horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie L Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny hands down
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had one on his phone an said he loved it. So I got one.. can’t tell you how nice it is to be able to use google maps while goin down the road an not hav to hold the phone an drive a big rig as you’re trying to make sure you pull into the right driveway
customer_reviews.author: Rob h

customer_reviews.title: Great car mount~~~
customer_reviews.text: It is very solid and I did not need to attach anything to the back of my case/phone. However, if cables are connect to the phone and it weighs down the phone a bit, then the mount can only be used in portrait mode. Also, any extreme bumps/potholes on the road will knock it slightly off where it may need to be readjusted. It doesn't happen frequently enough where it is a hassle but definitely enough times where it's noticeable. I would still recommend it since it is universal.
customer_reviews.author: nyjeeee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Seriously IN LOVE with this! This has literally been a Godsend. My iphone 6s fits well with or without a case, it would fit many sizes of phones. You can turn the phone at whatever angle needed, useful for traveling and using phone as a gps, useful if driving and playing music you can easily see and navigate screen. Have even used to play movies on long trips for passenger- as you can turn it whichever way if you have it docked in the middle of the car. Honestly this is the best purchase ive ever made here on amazon. If you're thinking about getting this, stop thinking about it and buy it. Worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: Letsbuysomebooks

customer_reviews.title: Very strong Magnet. Great not just for sticking to the ball bearing.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these for many phones over the years. The ball bearing, I mount in the car, but in my place of work, I can stick the phone to any metal surface. It's also good for finding staples and nails in the carpet. Make sure you stick the magnet to the center of gravity or the phone will reorient itself vertically. Only complain is it's a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not carry your debit/credit card near the magnet
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend for all who love to carry their debit/credit cards alone with their phones as this magnet is so strong it deseables the swipe feature on your cards. I didn’t catch along till my 3rd card was disabled. Other than that it’s super strong the rubber in the back does get weak but it’s not a fast process.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely handy to have in your vehicle. That's why I have one in every vehicle we own. Really helps with keeping your eyes on the road, yet still using your maps to get where you need to go.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Maddux

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: There is limited dash space in a 2019 Jeep Wrangler, this worked great! So far the adhesion of the steelie ball has held up in the low temps, (single digits F), and the adjustable bracket has held up well to a few different phones when we took turns driving on a recent road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea and it works almost perfect! Vent clamp is super strong and easy to remove if needed. Magnet on phone is small enough and the adhesive on it hasn’t let me down. Biggest issue is that while driving, regardless of the road condition or speed, the phone slowly tilts/angles down rather than staying in a set position. So as I’m watching the Cubs game and doing 75 on the open road, I find that I’m constantly repositioning my phone, which is easy, but still a pain. If they could just fix that issue, I’d invest in this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother. Phone swivels too much.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’m not impressed at all. It cost too much money and once installed, the phone swivels around when going over any little bump. Magnets just aren’t a good concept for holding a phone still. I’ll stick to the old-school screw down swivel type.
customer_reviews.author: Duke_Webb

customer_reviews.title: The magnet messed up all my cards And had to ...
customer_reviews.text: The magnet messed up all my cards And had to keep getting new ones. Can’t gave your phone I’m even in your bag with your wallet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be great but no bueno.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product if the magnet was stronger. My iPhone XR falls off within 5-10 seconds every time. Doesn’t matter if the car’s moving or not. Pretty bummed because my brother loves this thing and it would be perfect if it actually worked. Unfortunately they need to make a stronger magnet.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little magnet
customer_reviews.text: Great phone holder. The part that attaches in your car is small and doesn't get in the way, but the piece that attaches to the phone - though small - was a little uncomfortable for me initially. Have had this for several months and haven't had any problems with either piece coming off. I do find that when my phone is attached in the car, that because it's a round magnet, the phone does rotate a little. But otherwise a quality phone holder much better than a vent one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I glued the button on after the second time my iphone 6s plus in a Lifeproof FRE case fell off the magnet and this time it has been holding and working great, I just had to deface my case and ...
customer_reviews.text: Both the original glue and the replacement attachment sticker they sent failed to hold. I glued the button on after the second time my iphone 6s plus in a Lifeproof FRE case fell off the magnet and this time it has been holding and working great, I just had to deface my case and the manget to get it to stick properly. Being able to stick my phone to any magnetic surface is a very handy feature.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great vent phone holder!
customer_reviews.text: Good vent phone holder! Works great in the vents of a '19 Ford F-350! Holds my Google Pixel XL with an OtterBox defender case. I drive a work truck all day for service calls, so this sees a lot of use. I like that the vent paddles lock in place and that the phone grips lock as well. I have only had to readjust the angle of the phone occasionally when going over rough county roads, otherwise it holds pretty well! Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seat to the ball very well and falls off and doesn't hold a position well even after 2 weeks of attempted use.
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to give this a good review, I have purchased one of these before and love it but the orange rubber on this one is much stiffer than my old one and therefore the phone doesn't seat to the ball very well and falls off and doesn't hold a position. I am disappointed in this one. I even waited a few weeks to give a review as I thought over time it would get better but it hasn't
customer_reviews.author: Myridge

customer_reviews.title: Steelie grip not needed
customer_reviews.text: i did not use the ph grip. I have an otto box cover which is rubber and the magnet disk does not adhere to rubber. So i cut out a hole to poke through the rubber and attach to the steelie ball. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick  Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Phone drops down and can't use functions
customer_reviews.text: The suction is great; adheres to the window but problem is the phone drops down and the holders cover the phone function so when it rings, you can't answer it because the screen goes blank. I think this is a good product and a great idea for hands free but unfortunately it just doesn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: pmb

customer_reviews.title: Fades fast and adhesive doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive had to be replaced about a month. The black is fading pretty bad. I do love the concept and the ability to keep in my car hands free but hate that it’s fading so looks bad.
customer_reviews.author: C. Knasel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cell phone holder on the market I mounted it in my Jeep so I travel over some rough terrain and it has yet to fall off, and you can rotate your phone to any position and it stays put...
customer_reviews.author: David Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Dash Mount
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good way to mount my iPhone XS Max but it would not hold my phone in place with the standard magnet. I ordered the plus magnet but it would not fit the dash mount. Don’t know why a plus magnet is not made for the dash mount.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Porter

customer_reviews.title: maybe I'll use gorilla glue?
customer_reviews.text: My dash is fake leather, this thing falls off. However; the flipside is that I have a rubberized phone case - and the tab hasn't fallen off of that thing! great holding power. Maybe I'll juice up the other piece, I just can't seem to bring myself to harsh up my new dash, just yet... lol.
customer_reviews.author: David Broussard

customer_reviews.title: DI NOT STICK
customer_reviews.text: May work on "some" dashes but fell off of mine overnight. Followed instructions to the letter. Was allowing to sit for 24 hours. Checked on the steelie ball the next morning and it was"gone". Finally found it under the seat. Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: BR

product_meta.title: Nite Ize Original Steelie Dash Mount Kit - Magnetic Car Dash Mount for Smartphones (Packaging may vary)
product_meta.description: Style:Dash| Color:OriginalThe beauty of the Steelie Dash Mount Kit is in its simplicity. Using trusted Steelie magnetic mounting technology, this popular phone mounting system lets you be hands-free so you can keep your focus safely on the road. This all-inclusive kit includes one Steelie Magnetic Phone Socket with 3M VHB adhesive, one Steelie Dash Ball with 3M VHB adhesive, an alcohol prep pad, and easy installation instructions. The 3M VHB on the Dash Ball allows it to be secured to just about any smooth, hard, flat or vertical surface in your vehicle. The Magnetic Phone Socket also uses 3M VHB, so it adheres steadfastly to your phone or rigid case, but can be removed if you get a new Apple iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, or other phone or case. The socket features a powerful neodymium magnet and a smooth silicone ring that articulates with the steel ball on the Dash Mount. This allows your device to be tilted and viewed in landscape, portrait, and everything in between. This design ensures the phone stays securely in place, until you detach it from with a simple twist or tug. Speed bumps, potholes, quick turns are no match for Steelie's magnetic holding power. Because of its fumble-free, secure design, the Steelie Phone Mounting kits are legal in all 50 United States. Plus, when you reach your destination and detach your phone, the Magnetic Phone Socket on your device means you can still attach it conveniently to other metal surfaces: refrigerator doors, metal shelving, other Steelie Mounts, and more. Steelie neodymium magnets are safe for use with mobile devices but should be kept away from magnetically sensitive objects like credit cards, pacemakers or computer hard drives.
feature_bullets: MAGNETIC CAR PHONE HOLDER FOR YOUR DASH, HANDS-FREE VIEWING - Dock your phone to your dashboard in a snap, with a sleek and compact design using Steelie magnetic mounting technology. Secure just about any phone to most any car dash

UNIVERSAL, SECURE ATTACHMENT TO PHONE, CASE, AND CAR - The Magnetic Phone Socket with 3M VHB adhesive secures to most any phone or rigid case. Stays on as long as you want, but can be removed. The Dash Mount is also equipped with 3M VHB adhesive

ADJUSTABLE VIEWING ANGLES - The Dash Mount features a steel ball that articulates with the Steelie Magnetic Phone Socket on your device allowing you to tilt your phone smoothly from landscape to portrait and everywhere in between
POWERFUL, HIGH-STRENGTH MAGNET - The neodymium magnet and silicone center create a strong grip and smooth glide when paired with the Steelie Dash Mount for safe use even when driving on bumpy roads

SAFE FOR USE WITH PHONES - The powerful magnet will NOT damage your mobile device. It can also be paired with GPS and MP3 devices. However, do not place it near magnetically sensitive objects such as credit cards, computer hard drives, or pacemakers
WORRY-FREE GUARANTEE - all Nite Ize products are backed by our Worry-Free Guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars6,580 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
